Mordor.name: Mordor
Mordor.event: Isildur cuts off Sauron's finger and the Ring

Dimholt Road.name: Dimholt Road
Dimholt Road.event: Aragorn, Legolas and Gimli ride to meet the Army of the Dead

Dimrill Dale.name: Dimrill Dale
Dimrill Dale.event: The Fellowship, now without Gandalf, escape Moria

Ered Nimrais.name: Ered Nimrais
Ered Nimrais.event: The beacons along The White Mountains from Gondor to Rohan are lit

Edoras.name: Edoras
Edoras.event: The capital of Rohan, the hall of King Theoden

Ford of Bruinen.name: Ford of Bruinen
Ford of Bruinen.event: Arwen defeats the Nazgûl by conjuring up a flood

Isengard.name: Isengard
Isengard.event: Gandalf rides up to Isengard in Nan Curunír

Ithilien camp.name: Ithilien camp
Ithilien camp.event: Sam and Gollum discuss coney cookery

The Argonath on the Anduin River.name: The Argonath on the Anduin River
The Argonath on the Anduin River.event: The Fellowship pass the Pillars of the Kings on the Anduin River

Fangorn Forest.name: Fangorn Forest
Fangorn Forest.event: Aragorn, Legolas and Gimli are looking for Merry and Pippin

Rivendell.name: Rivendell
Rivendell.event: The Fellowship move south out of Rivendell

Dead Marshes.name: Dead Marshes
Dead Marshes.event: Gollum guides Frodo and Sam through the swamp
